data.title: Karan Singh Grover-Shraddha Nigam To Pulkit-Shweta: Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage
data.meta_description: It is quite good to see our favourite celebrities having a &quot;happy ending&quot; in love. But not everyone is lucky in the first go itself. There are many popular celebrities who were deeply in love and were even married to each other, but their relationship ended in a divorce after a short span of time. Let's take a look at couples who fell-in-love, got married but their marriage didn't last long.
data.text:
It is quite good to see our favourite celebrities having a "happy ending" in love. But not everyone is lucky in the first go itself. There are many popular celebrities who were deeply in love and were even married to each other, but their relationship ended in a divorce after a short span of time. Let's take a look at couples who fell-in-love, got married but their marriage didn't last long.

Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage

It is quite good to see our favourite celebrities having a "happy ending" in love. But not everyone is lucky in the first go itself. There are many popular celebrities who were deeply in love and were even married to each other, but their relationship ended in a divorce after a short span of time. Let's take a look at couples who fell-in-love, got married but their marriage didn't last long. (Image: Twitter)

Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage

Karan Singh Grover and Shraddha Nigam: Karan Singh Grover and Shraddha Nigam's marriage lasted only for 10 months. The duo had tied the knot in the year December 2008. The reason for the couple's separation is allegedly Karan's extramarital affairs. The two have now moved on in their lives. While Shraddha is happily married to Mayank Anand, Karan has tied the knot with Bipasha Basu. (Image: Twitter)

Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage

Pulkit Samrat and Shweta Rohira: Pulkit Samrat tied the knot with Salman Khan's rakhi sister, Shweta Rohira, in November 2014 in an extravagant wedding ceremony. However, the couple parted ways in 2015 owing to Pulkit's alleged closeness with co-star Yami Gautam. (Image: Twitter)

Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage

Chahatt Khanna and Bharat Narsinghani: Chahatt, who's acted in a number of serials like Shakalaka Boom Boom, Don and Bade Acche Lagte Hai, quit her career in 2006 after she married Bharat Narsinghani, a businessman. However, the two got separated within a few months of marriage after the actress filed a domestic violence complaint aginst him. (Image: Instagram)

Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage

Manisha Koirala and Samrat Dahal: The two had just completed a year of marriage in 2011 when they started living separately. Though the news of their separation made headlines much later. Talking about her failed marriage, Manisha had said, "I had a dreamy idea of marriage. If you are in a bad relationship, then it's better to separate. There is no bitterness. I take full responsibility of hurrying up and wanting to get married and then realising I am not meant for this. There is no fault from other side, the fault is mine." (Image: Twitter)

Celebs Who Parted Ways Within 1 Year Of Marriage

Rakhee and Gulzar: Gulzar's whirlwind romance with Rakhee was one of the most high-profile alliances of the 70s. However, their association was tragically shot-lived. They got married in 1973 and separated a year later after their daughter Meghna Gulzar was born. (Image: Instagram)
